page.title: 18PERFORMING ARTS
page.content: For a small town we are fortunate in being able to take part and enjoy a variety of Arts.The local Oakwood Art Centre offers tuition in all musical instruments as well as group work in the band,string or woodwind group or brass.It produces 2 concerts a year.As well the Centre puts on 2 classical conerts,6 jazz,2 folk and 4 plays per- formed by amateur and professionals. This month "Midsummer Night's Dream"is being produced.Exhibitions of art,pho- tography and needlecraft also take place.The town has two ballet schools and a majorette group.Maldon Choral Society produces an average of 3 conc- erts a year-some in conjunction with other choral societies and some with a full orchestra.Local churches also have choirs and drama guilds which regularly give performances of a high standard.
